description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.newg6eVfl4xzfnMq]{Guard}

Those who have come to rely on you know you are vigilant and ready to help at a moment’s notice. You know when something just doesn’t feel right, and you’ve saved the life of more than one client. You can perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH#first-aid]{first aid} task of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.d4fcGwOcrsuYrwGH]{Medicine} skill as a move action rather than as a standard action, and you can perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ#sense-mental-effect]{sense mental effect} task of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} as a full action instead of taking 1 minute. In addition, you gain a +4 insight bonus to Fortitude saving throws against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#sleep-deprivation]{sleep deprivation} (Core Rulebook 404).

modifiers.name: Able Guardian
modifiers.notes: You gain a +4 insight bonus to Fortitude saving throws against sleep deprivation
